releases.summary: Feature: Optional npm package installation for features (Happy Coder support)
highlights: Features can now define optional npm packages to install globally
Happy Mode feature prompts to install happy-coder CLI during init
Graceful fallback with manual install instructions on failure
2-minute timeout for npm install operations

other.name: npm-package-install
other.description: Features can specify npmPackage and npmInstallPrompt for optional global installs

releases.summary: Fix: Complete feature deployment - hooks, commands, and auto-selection now work correctly
highlights: Feature commands are now auto-included when a feature is selected
Feature hooks are now properly deployed during init
OPTIONAL_FEATURES cleaned up to only reference existing templates
tech-stack.json now tracks deployed commands and hooks for verification
Step 6b added to show feature hook deployment progress

other.name: feature-auto-deployment
other.description: When selecting a feature, its commands and hooks are automatically deployed

other.name: deployment-tracking
other.description: tech-stack.json now includes _deployment section tracking what was installed

releases.summary: Feature: Smart Update Merge Tracking - Intelligent handling of customized assets during updates
highlights: Tracks usage of commands, skills, agents, and hooks in usage-tracking.json
Smart merge detection: identifies customized assets that have updates available
Interactive merge exploration: Claude explains what changes, offers merge/replace/skip options
New /update-smart command for manual merge exploration
Usage tracking hook runs on PostToolUse for Skill and Read tools

commands.name: update-smart
commands.description: Smart merge manager for customized assets during updates

hooks.name: usage-tracking
hooks.description: Tracks usage of commands, skills, agents for smart merge detection

other.name: smart-merge-system
other.description: Intelligent diff comparison and merge exploration for customized assets

other.name: usage-tracking-json
other.description: Persistent tracking of asset usage in .claude/config/usage-tracking.json

highlights: Shows setup tip when /project-impl hasn't been run yet
Tracks projectImplCompleted state in ccasp-state.json
Banner disappears after running any /project-impl option

releases.summary: Security: Removed project-specific example text from prompts
highlights: Changed ngrok example from 'my.app.benefits360' to 'my-app-name'
Security audit confirmed no personal data in npm package

releases.summary: Fix: Windows compatibility for update check hook
highlights: Fixed npm commands failing silently on Windows
Removed bash-specific syntax (2>/dev/null)

releases.summary: Fix: settings.json hook merging for existing projects
highlights: Init now merges update check hook into existing settings.json
Existing projects get automatic update notifications

releases.summary: Automatic update notifications with startup hook
highlights: Startup hook checks npm for updates automatically
Dynamic menu header with version and [NEW UPDATE] badge
One-key update with [N] in menu

hooks.name: ccasp-update-check
hooks.description: Checks npm for updates on Claude startup

releases.summary: Added agent-powered project implementation and version tracking
highlights: New /project-impl command for agent-powered setup
Version tracking with update notifications
Prior releases menu for feature management

commands.name: project-impl
commands.description: Agent-powered project implementation (audit, enhance, detect, configure)

commands.name: update-check
commands.description: Check for updates and add new features to your project

other.name: version-tracking
other.description: Background version checking with update notifications

other.name: prior-releases-menu
other.description: Review and enable features from prior releases

releases.summary: Settings schema update and hooks format improvements
highlights: Updated settings.json schema for Claude Code compatibility
Improved hooks configuration format

releases.summary: Backup on overwrite and uninstall wizard
highlights: Automatic backup when overwriting existing files
New Remove CCASP option in wizard
Selective removal with backup support

other.name: uninstall-wizard
other.description: Remove CCASP from project with backup options

highlights: Added fallback to template files for commands
Fixed optional chaining assignments
Comprehensive GitHub Wiki documentation
Clearer terminal vs slash command documentation

releases.summary: Initial release of Claude CLI Advanced Starter Pack
highlights: Vibe-code friendly setup wizard
Tech stack detection with 86+ components
GitHub Project Board integration
Phased development system
Interactive /menu command
